Game.Name: Sapo Xule - S.O.S Lagoa Poluida (Brazil)
Game.plot: Astro Warrior pits you against the enemy's fleet of superpowered spaceships. And ultimately, the invincible Master Ship. In this treacherous black universe you can only count on yourself. To shoot fast. To shoot straight. If you do - you get more power. More weapons. To beat the villains. To beat the odds. If you don't - the odds beat you!Cheat: Secret Options ScreenDuring the game, when "Galaxy Zone," "Asteroid Zone," or "Nebula Zone" appear on the screen, quickly tap Buttons 1 and 2, alternating. It is VERY difficult to get it to work as the tempo needs to be just right, but when it does you will access the options screen.Cheat: Start new levels with dronesWhenever you finish off a level and the name of the next level is on the screen, hit 1 and 2 alternately about 25-30 times total. If you are fast and don't double hit one of the buttons, you'll get those 2 purple firing drones to begin the next stage with.
Game.Notes: Based on Sapo Xule comic strip series from Portugal, this game is actually a reworking of Sega's Astro Warrior, with the frog character swapped for the spaceship.
